summary:
An Australian news agency is reporting that robot vacuum cleaners from the Chinese company Deebot are surreptitiously taking photos and recording audio, and sending that data back to the vendor to train their AIs. 
Ecovacs‚Äôs privacy policy‚Äîavailable elsewhere in the app‚Äîallows for blanket collection of user data for research purposes, including:

The 2D or 3D map of the user‚Äôs house generated by the device
Voice recordings from the device‚Äôs microphone
Photos or videos recorded by the device‚Äôs camera
It also states that voice recordings, videos and photos that are deleted via the app may continue to be held and used by Ecovacs
title: Deebot Robot Vacuums Are Using Photos and Audio to Train Their AI
